synopsis: In episode #8 of the podcast, Devam and Ahir welcome Ganesh Ramakrishnan to discuss the intricacies of motivation and the challenges of navigating personal and academic pressures. Through candid conversations, the trio explores the importance of self-awareness, emotional regulation, and the power of community support in overcoming obstacles.
quotes: Sometimes, it's not about the motivation; it's about understanding the emotions that hold you back.
You have to trust the process and allow yourself the grace to just be.
Wiggle your toe. Sometimes, all it takes is the smallest movement to spark change.
If you're feeling anxious, remember you're not aloneâ€”reach out to those who care.
It's okay to take a step back and just breathe; your mental health matters.
We often get trapped in our own minds, forgetting the world around us.
Making new friends can open doors to passions you never knew you had.
Your journey doesn't have to be optimal; it just needs to be yours.
Finding what you like versus what you don't is a journey worth taking.
Even the smallest wins can help you build momentum for bigger victories.
